results.title: HMG-CoA reductase inhibitor simvastatin profoundly improves survival in a murine model of sepsis.
results.text_hl: In addition, treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ reversed @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ alterations in @<m>DISEASE_Cecal_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002429 @@@CLP@@@ @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@, namely, increased monocyte adhesion to endothelium.

citations.NLM: Merx MW, Liehn EA, Janssens U, Lütticken R, Schrader J, Hanrath P, Weber C. HMG-CoA reductase inhibitor simvastatin profoundly improves survival in a murine model of sepsis. Circulation. 2004 Jun 1;109(21):2560-5. PMID: 15123521
citations.BibTeX: @article{15123521, title={HMG-CoA reductase inhibitor simvastatin profoundly improves survival in a murine model of sepsis.}, author={Merx MW and Liehn EA and Janssens U and Lütticken R and Schrader J and Hanrath P and Weber C}, journal={Circulation}, volume={109}, number={21}, pages={2560-5}}

results.title: Brain Oxidative Stress During Experimental Sepsis Is Attenuated by Simvastatin Administration.
results.text_hl: The animals submitted to @<m>DISEASE_Cecal_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002429 @@@CLP@@@ were treated 4 days before and 48 h after surgery.

citations.NLM: Catalão CHR, Santos-Júnior NN, da Costa LHA, Souza AO, Alberici LC, Rocha MJA. Brain Oxidative Stress During Experimental Sepsis Is Attenuated by Simvastatin Administration. Mol Neurobiol. 2017 Nov;54(9):7008-7018. PMID: 27796742

results.title: Statin treatment after onset of sepsis in a murine model improves survival.
results.text_hl: We have recently demonstrated that pretreatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ profoundly improves survival in a @<m>DISEASE_Cecal_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002429 @@@cecal@@@ ligation @DISEASE_Corneal_Perforation @DISEASE_MESH:D057112 @@@and perforation@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Cecal_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002429 @@@CLP@@@) model of @DISEASE_Sepsis @DISEASE_MESH:D018805 @@@sepsis@@@.

citations.NLM: Merx MW, Liehn EA, Graf J, van de Sandt A, Schaltenbrand M, Schrader J, Hanrath P, Weber C. Statin treatment after onset of sepsis in a murine model improves survival. Circulation. 2005 Jul 5;112(1):117-24. PMID: 15998696

results.title: Effect of Simvastatin on the Intestinal Rho/ROCK Signaling Pathway in Rats With Sepsis.
results.text_hl: MATERIALS AND METHODS: Male Wistar @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ were pretreated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (0.2 mug/g of body weight) for 1 week before @<m>DISEASE_Cecal_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002429 @@@cecal@@@ ligation and puncture.

citations.NLM: Wang Y, Wang X, Yang W, Zhao X, Zhang R. Effect of Simvastatin on the Intestinal Rho/ROCK Signaling Pathway in Rats With Sepsis. J Surg Res. 2018 Dec;232():531-538. PMID: 30463769

results.title: An experimental study of the protective effect of simvastatin on sepsis-induced myocardial depression in rats.
results.text_hl: Thirty six adult male Wistar @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ were pretreated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (0.2mug/g, q12h) for one week before @<m>DISEASE_Cecal_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002429 @@@cecal@@@ ligation and puncture (CLP).

citations.NLM: Wang Y, Zhang L, Zhao X, Yang W, Zhang R. An experimental study of the protective effect of simvastatin on sepsis-induced myocardial depression in rats. Biomed Pharmacother. 2017 Oct;94():705-711. PMID: 28800541
